name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spendbase for Chrome: SaaS management and Shadow IT discovery

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy and reliable way to discover every single SaaS application used in your company — know who uses what and how often.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
10X SAAS USAGE VISIBILITY
The extension will ensure you have accurate app usage data in Spendbase so that you can make timely and efficient SaaS management decisions.

➤ Shadow IT detection
Identify every new app your team starts using as soon as someone logs into it through their corporate account for the first time.

➤ Real-time app usage
Have up-to-date app usage data to justify subscription renewals or cancellations based on their actual adoption and usage.

➤ Last login date
Monitor when employees stop using apps, enabling timely offboarding and effective license redistribution.

COMPLIANT DATA COLLECTION
Spendbase for Chrome tracks your company employees' logins to apps on the browser under their corporate accounts. 

➤ Spendbase for Chrome collects minimum necessary data: 

• corporate email
• date and time of login
• application name

➤ No extra data collected
The extension does not collect browsing history, website content, passwords, or any other excessive data.

➤ Respect for user privacy
The extension does not track activities when employees use their personal accounts.

HOW TO START TRACKING WITH EXTENSION:
You should start with a short list of action to take to make it up and running:
1. Create an account in Spendbase as an Admin
2. Connect you workspace to identify employees activity (Google Workspace, Microsoft Entra ID) in there
3. Make your employees install & sign in to extension (without any additional invitation)

As soon as you've done these simple three steps we'll automatically start tracking activities and syncing them to Spendbase platform

MANUAL OR FORCED INSTALL
You can install the browser extension for all employees using either method:

➤ Manual install
Employees can install the extension from the Google Chrome Store manually upon request.

➤ Forced install
You can use the Force Install feature in Google Admin Console to automatically install the extension on all corporate accounts.

With Spendbase for Chrome active on every corporate account browser, you will receive the most complete and accurate data on your corporate app usage.
______________________________

ABOUT SPENDBASE
Spendbase is a SaaS subscription management tool for IT and finance teams to optimize software usage and spending.

Additionally, Spendbase provides software cost optimization services, including vendor contract negotiations, expert advice on software consolidation, and partner discounts on SaaS and cloud services.

The unique savings-based pricing model allows customers to receive cost negotiation support without upfront payments, sharing only 25% of the amount saved. 

Spendbase customers achieve up to 39% in software savings using our risk-free vendor negotiation services.

Learn more on https://www.spendbase.co/
